  • Method Details

    • isClicked

      protected abstract Boolean isClicked(Vector2 click)
      this method must check if the mouse click was on this object or not
      Parameters:
      click - mouse click position in global space as Vector2
      Returns:
      true if click was on object, false if not

    • onClick

      protected void onClick()
      additional actions for object to execute if it has received a click upon this function is called before publishing OnClickEvent

    • onUnClick

      protected void onUnClick()
      executed when pointer was raised up at the object

    • onObjectDispose

      protected abstract void onObjectDispose()
